interpretation: The "fork and knife" card represents nourishment and sustenance. It is a reminder to take care of our physical needs and prioritize self-care. This card can also suggest the need for balance in our lives, both in terms of diet and overall well-being. It may be time to evaluate our habits and make adjustments to promote greater health and vitality. Additionally, this card can symbolize social gatherings and the importance of sharing meals with others. It may be a sign to connect with loved ones over a shared meal or to seek out new friendships through food-related activities. Overall, the "fork and knife" card encourages us to honor our bodies and cultivate a sense of community through food.
